titles.title: NIH Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2008
A bill to make emergency supplemental appropriations for the National Institutes of Health for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6872)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary:
7/16/2008--Introduced.
NIH Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2008 - Makes emergency supplemental appropriations to the National Institutes of Health (NIH) and the National Cancer Institute for FY2008 to support additional scientific research.
